description: Go all out with oysters in a delicate Vietnamese dressing of lime, chili and fish sauce. This recipe has the perfect balance of flavours and is sure to impress.
keywords: Oysters,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Dec 2020,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Oysters With Vietnamese Chilli Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 fresh Pacific oysters, on half shell

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chilli, garlic, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, vinegar and coriander in a small bowl.
Preheat oven grill to high. Place salt on a baking tray or heatproof platter. Arrange oysters on salt, then grill for 1 minute. Spoon over dressing and serve immediately with lime cheeks.
